description: Led a team of 25 to build a Mars rover. Established the team and communication channels, secured funding, and passed a critical design review before handing over to new leadership.

Managed social media, event promotion, and branding for a 100-year-old student organization. Organized professional and social events for up to 400 attendees and managed an annual budget of ~$120k. Also served as Treasurer of the Physics Society, handling finances and record-keeping.
Coordinated STEM competitions and events, organized Science Week activities, and promoted STEM engagement (especially encouraging young women in STEM).
